uniequip_003_cgbird.name: Fleeting Phantom
uniequip_003_cgbird.upgradeDescription: Can summon Phantoms. Phantoms cannot attack or block enemies, but have 75 RES and {30%} Physical Dodge and are more likely to be targeted by enemies. Phantoms lose 3% Max HP per second

uniequip_003_cgbird.name: Fleeting Phantom
uniequip_003_cgbird.upgradeDescription: Can summon Phantoms. Phantoms cannot attack or block enemies, but have 75 RES and {30%} Physical Dodge and are more likely to be targeted by enemies. Phantoms lose 3% Max HP per second. [Nightingale gain more Phantoms when deployed]

uniequip_004_phatom.name: Phantom in the Mirror
uniequip_004_phatom.upgradeDescription: Can summon a stronger clone with the same abilities as Phantom, but has its own redeployment time; in [Integrated Strategies] clone does not use deployment slot, when clone is deployed Phantom reactivate skill again (can stack skill effect up to {cnt} times)

uniequip_004_phatom.name: Phantom in the Mirror

uniequip_004_kalts.name: Mon3tr
uniequip_004_kalts.upgradeDescription: Can use and heal Mon3tr, and Mon3tr has a 25 second redeployment time. Kal'tsit will prioritize healing herself and Mon3tr; If Mon3tr is not within Kal'tsit's Attack Range, Mon3tr's DEF is reduced to 0; in [Integrated Strategies] Mon3tr Max HP {+%}, ATK {+%}, does not use deployment slot, receive {+%} healing amount
